tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stores ( 
    store_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    store_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    avg_daily_sales DECIMAL(10, 2), 
    rent_cost DECIMAL(10, 2), 
    customer_age_range VARCHAR(50), 
    customer_income_range VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE Locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name TEXT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    population INT
);

CREATE TABLE Demographics (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    median_income FLOAT,
    avg_age FLOAT,
    education_level TEXT,
    household_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE store_locations (
    store_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_name VARCHAR(50),
    location_lat FLOAT,
    location_long FLOAT,
    demographic_data JSON
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    population INT,
    avg_income FLOAT,
    avg_age INT,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(2)
);

CREATE TABLE StoreAnalytics (
    analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    demographic_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DemographicData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT,
    population INT,
    median_income INT,
    median_age INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES StoreLocations(store_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CompetitionData (
    competition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    distance FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES StoreLocations(store_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketTrends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT,
    trend_type VARCHAR(255),
    trend_value VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES StoreLocations(store_id)
);

CREATE TABLE StorePerformance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    store_id INT,
    sales_amount FLOAT,
    customer_traffic INT,
    satisfaction_score INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES StoreLocations(store_id)
);
